description: Adds or removes Vertica database schema and roles.

create_roles.description: Comma separated list of roles to create and grant usage and create access to the schema.

name.description: Name of the schema to add or remove.

login_user.description: The username used to authenticate with.

usage_roles.description: Comma separated list of roles to create and grant usage access to the schema.

state.description: Whether to create C(present), or drop C(absent) a schema.

login_password.description: The password used to authenticate with.

owner.description: Name of the user to set as owner of the schema.

port.description: Vertica cluster port to connect to.
